name: From the Void - Fire
description:
"In the beginning there was nothing.

Then, from the Void... Fire"

Made for the Kindred Community Jam #6 - At the beginning there was nothing. Spanning from 3/4 2021 - 10/4 2021.

The game was made by me.

The fire effect I learned from here:

It's in french, and I don't speak french, so it was a lot of work.

The character rig I got from here:

https://free3d.com/3d-model/rigged-male-human-442626.html

I sliced it up and did the animations in Blender.

Sounds are a mix of Humblebundle packs and Freesounds.org
